義.definition: justice; righteousness; meaning; foster (father etc); adopted; artificial (tooth, limb etc); relationship; friendship

義不容辭.definition: not to be shirked without dishonor (idiom); incumbent; bounden (duty)

義之所在.definition: justice is to be found everywhere (idiom)

義勇.definition: courageous in fighting for a just cause

義勇軍進行曲.pinyin: yì yǒng jūn jìn xíng qū
義勇軍進行曲.definition: March of the Volunteer Army (PRC National Anthem)

義和團.definition: the Righteous and Harmonious Fists; the Boxers (history)

義和團運動.definition: Boxer Rebellion (1900-1901), a peasant uprising that attempted to expel all foreigners from China, eventually suppressed by an international coalition

義和拳.definition: the Righteous and Harmonious Fists; the Boxers (history)

義士.definition: high-minded and righteous person; patriot; loyalist

義安.definition: Yi'an, a district of Tongling City 銅陵市|铜陵市[Tong2ling2 Shi4], Anhui

義安區.definition: Yi'an, a district of Tongling City 銅陵市|铜陵市[Tong2ling2 Shi4], Anhui

義憤填胸.definition: righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice

義憤填膺.definition: righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice

義正辭嚴.definition: (idiom) to speak forcibly out of a sense of righteousness

義氣.definition: spirit of loyalty and self-sacrifice; code of brotherhood; also pr. [yi4 qi5]

義烏.definition: Yiwu, county-level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

義烏市.definition: Yiwu, county-level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

義無反顧.definition: honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back; no surrender; to pursue justice with no second thoughts

義理.definition: doctrine (esp. religious); argumentation (in a speech or essay)

義竹.definition: Yizhu or Ichu Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

義竹鄉.definition: Yizhu or Ichu Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

義縣.definition: Yi county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning

義縣龍.definition: Yixianosaurus, genus of theropod dinosaur from Yi county 義縣|义县, Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, west Liaoning

義診.definition: to provide free medical treatment; to provide medical treatment, donating consultation fees to a charitable cause

義譯.definition: to translate a term into Chinese using a combination of characters or words that suggests its meaning (as opposed to transliteration 音譯|音译[yin1yi4]) (e.g. 超文本[chao1wen2ben3], 火車|火车[huo3che1])

義賣.definition: to hold a charity bazaar; to sell goods for a good cause

義馬.definition: Yima, county-level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan

義馬市.definition: Yima, county-level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
